Sequence Information.Target Organism: Listeria monocytogenes DSM 20600(MIC=15µM),Listeria fleischmannii DSM 24998(MIC=60µM),Listeria grayi DSM 20601(MIC=8µM),Listeria marthii DSM 23813(no activity data),Listeria innocua DSM 20649(no activity data),Listeria welshimeri DSM 20650(no activity data),Listeria seeligeri DSM 20751(MIC=15µM),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 2569(MIC=60µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis DSM 3269(no activity data),Escherichia coli D31(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 50071(MIC=30µM),Fusarium culmorum(IC50=4µM),Fusarium graminearum 8/1(IC50=4µM),Plasmodium falciparum(30-40% Inhibition=25µM),Plasmodium falciparum(50-60% Inhibition=50µM)
